duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality customer service and support for clients in a professional and courteous manner.
Handle customer inquiries and issues via phone and email, resolving them effectively and efficiently.
Navigate computer systems and platforms to input and retrieve customer data accurately.
Manage time effectively to handle multiple customer interactions and tasks simultaneously.
Maintain a calm and patient demeanor when dealing with challenging customer situations.
Adhere to company policies and procedures to ensure compliance and quality service delivery.
Document customer interactions and issue resolutions for future reference and analysis.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Associate's degree preferred)
